info.title: Taunt as a service
info.description: Fungenerators taunt generation API generates random taunts / insults,  relevant to the given category. Many categories are supported and new ones are added very frequently. [Click here to subscribe](http://fungenerators.com/api/taunt/)

get.description: Generated taunts in the given category

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit. Controls number of taunts generated. Max of 5-10 based on the plan
